author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR addresses partially https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/29850 by adding tests that include `code-checks`,  `code-format`, and compilation (for selected subsets of the skeletons), following the suggestion in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/29850#issuecomment-1050656903


#### PR validation:

Unit tests run.
title: Add tests for Skeleton templates
